title: Login Issue
description: Customer unable to log into their account.

title: Account Locked
description: User account locked after multiple failed login attempts.

title: Refund Request
description: Customer requested refund for a duplicate charge.

title: Shipping Delay
description: Customer reported order not delivered within promised time.

title: Product Defect
description: Item received was defective and not working.

title: Password Reset
description: Customer requested a password reset link.

title: Feature Request
description: Customer suggested adding dark mode to the app.

title: Incorrect Billing
description: Customer charged higher than advertised price.

title: Subscription Cancelation
description: Customer unable to cancel subscription via dashboard.

title: UI Bug Report
description: Submit button not working on feedback form.

title: Order Cancelation
description: Customer wants to cancel an order before shipping.

title: App Crash Issue
description: Mobile app crashes on startup for Android 14.

title: Email Notification Error
description: Customer not receiving order confirmation emails.

title: Duplicate Account Merge
description: Customer requested merging two duplicate accounts.
